title:
Four-Charm-Quark Matter from the CMS Collaboration as a Witness of the
  Development of High-Precision Hadron Spectroscopy
abstract:
Recent CMS observations in the di-$J/\psi$ invariant mass spectrum reveal new
structures at 6638 MeV ($X(6600)$)) and 7134 MeV, and confirm the $X(6900)$ at
6847 MeV. These findings provide crucial insights into four-charm-quark matter.
The CMS Collaboration's result serves as a testament to the progress in
exploring exotic hadronic matter.
